detectors.description:
StakingRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256,address) (media/etherscan/0xa306065a144a16dbc99f06e16737dd400e6e1778-StakingRewards.sol#561-578) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(rewardsDuration) (media/etherscan/0xa306065a144a16dbc99f06e16737dd400e6e1778-StakingRewards.sol#568)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (media/etherscan/0xa306065a144a16dbc99f06e16737dd400e6e1778-StakingRewards.sol#571)
